creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George R. Steiner
description: ceramic bowl, blue and white with sailing ship within bowl, exterior decorated by two outdoor scenes and two birds in flight
markings: \'Succefs to The/THREE BROTHERS/1764\', in blue glaze at lower center of bowl\'s interior; dealer and lender\'s stickers at underside of base
object_name: "Success to the Three Brothers" punch bowl
text: Ships such as the "Three Brothers" specialized in China trade, one of the most lucrative businesses in the 17th and 18th centuries.  They sailed at a particularly fast pace, and attracted great interest in their voyages.
title: "Success to the Three Brothers" punch bowl
